snippet: Lawyers for former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez have asked a Massachusetts judge to allow jurors at his trial to see the SUV prosecutors say Hernandez was in when he killed two men in 2012....
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for former New England Patriots player Aaron Hernandez have asked a Massachusetts judge to allow jurors at his trial to see the SUV prosecutors say Hernandez was in when he killed two men in 2012.

headline.main: Hernandez Wants Jury to See SUV Apparently Used in Shooting
headline.print_headline: Hernandez Wants Jury to See SUV Apparently Used in Shooting
